actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the Subcommittee on International Organizations of the Committee on International Relations in conducting its Investigation of Korean-American Relations to require, by subpoena or otherwise, the attendance of any person at the taking of a deposition by any member of that Subcommittee.

summary.text: Authorizes the Subcommittee on International Organizations of the House Committee on International Relations, in conducting its investigation of Korean-American relations, to require, by subpoenea or otherwise, the attendance of any person at the taking of a deposition by any Subcommittee Member.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the Subcommittee on International Organizations of the Committee on International Relations in conducting its Investigation of Korean-American Relations to require, by subpoena or otherwise, the attendance of any person at the taking of a deposition by any member of that Subcommittee.
